question: Suppose the programmer wanted to change the class to represent a pet cat. Which is the appropriate name that follows PEP 8 recommendations?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: CapWords style, with all words capitalized and nothing in between, is recommended for class names. pet and cat are separate words and shoudn't have a character in between.
CapWords style, with all words capitalized and nothing in between, is recommended for class names. pet and cat are separate words and should be capitalized.
CapWords style, with all words capitalized and no spaces between words, is recommended for class names. "Pet" and "cat" are separate words, so each is capitalized and one directly follows the other.

detailedSolution: CapWords style, with all words capitalized and no spaces between words, is recommended for class names. "Pet" and "cat" are separate words, so each is capitalized and one directly follows the other.
